content: double_crochet in next 3dc ch2 double_crochet in of rnd1 *chain 3 skip 2dc and double_crochet in-between the next 3 dcs 2dc ch1 2dc in next ch1 space double_crochet in next two double_crochet s chain 3 skip 2 double_crochet and double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next 3 dcs ch2 double_crochet in next 3 dcs * repeat from * between the next two dcs * repeat from * around around to first ch3 at beginning of round connect ending with ch3 connect to beginning ch3 with with slip st slip_stitch in second chain of ch3 round 3 ch3 count as first double_crochet 3 double_crochet in chain of pre- vious round *ch3 single_crochet in next double_crochet ch3 4 double_crochet in next ch1 space * repeat from * around to first ch3 of round slip st to connect round 8 ch3 counts as first double_crochet double_crochet in next 2 dcs ch2 double_crochet in next 5dcs 2dc ch1 2dc in next ch1 space double_crochet in next 5 dcs ch2 double_crochet in next 3 dcs * ch4 single_crochet in next single_crochet ch4 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in next 5 dcs 2dc ch1 2dc in next ch1 space double_crochet in next 5 dcs ch2 double_crochet in next 3 dcs * repeat from * around to first ch3 at beginning of round connect with slip st round 9 ch3 counts as first double_crochet double_crochet in next 2 dcs * ch2 double_crochet in next 7 dcs 2dc ch1 2dc in next chain 1 space double_crochet in next 7 dcs ch2 double_crochet in next 3 dcs skip ch4s and next single_crochet and double_crochet in next 3 dcs ch2 * repeat from * around to first ch3 at begin- ning of round connect with slip st round 10 ch3 counts as first double_crochet double_crochet in next 2 dcs *ch1 double_crochet in next 9 dcs 2dc ch1 2dc in next chain 1 space double_crochet in next 9 dcs ch1 double_crochet in next 6 dcs* repeat from * around to first ch3 at beginning of round connect with slip st round 11 ch3 counts as first double_crochet double_crochet in each double_crochet and ch1 space to corner 2dc ch1 2dc in each corner chain connect with slip_stitch you should have 34 double_crochet s to a side round 12 ch2 single_crochet in each stitch to corner and in corner single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in ch1 space around then slip_stitch in first chain 36 single_crochet s per side round 13 in contrasting color ch2 single_crochet in each stitch and ch1 to corner and in corner single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in ch2 space around then slip_stitch in first chain 38 single_crochet s per side cut yarn pull through last loop this should make approximately a 10 square note some of this pattern is still in development stages if you see some mistakes let me know thank you god bless you mary
